altername_name: Sam & Max: Beyond Time and Space
Sam & Max: Season Two: All-Zeit Bereit
Sam & Max: Más Allá del Tiempo y del Espacio
name: Sam & Max: Season Two: Beyond Time and Space
overview: Season Two builds on Season One with more dynamic NPCs, an updated engine, a hint system, support for widescreen monitors, more realistic animations, and more mini-games within each episode. Season Two features a calibration assistant when first run, which allows the player to set their graphics and difficulty settings before playing
